#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int n, x,y,z;
		cin>>n;
		cin>>x>>y>>z;
		//cout<<"n="<<n<<endl;
		int i, j, x1, x2;
		long int num, price=0;
		for(i=1; i<=9; i++){
			for(j=0; j<=9; j++){
				num=x*100+y*10+z;
				num=num*10+j+i*10000;	
				if(num%n == 0){
					price = num/n;
					x1=i;
					x2=j;
				}
			}
		}
		if(price)
			cout<<x1<<" "<<x2<<" "<<price<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
			
	}
	return 0;
}
